title: Sky sailing: waiting for the wind
creator_credit: Marie Schurrer, Alex Ciecierski and Huemark Films
brief_description: Demonstrates the preparation and inspection of the hang glider prior to use, and shows learners receiving preliminary training before their first jump. The hang glider is shown in action, with a commentary describing techniques of sky sailing. Narrated by Stacey Foster.
creator_credit_for_label: Marie Schurrer, Alex Ciecierski and Huemark Films
